Hey everyone, hope you're good!

Just a quick one today, I'm assuming KSP2 will have discoverable asteroids similar to KSP1, however I always felt underwhelmed at their size. We know the asteroid that ended the dinosaurs was approximately 10km in size, is it too far fetched to suggest similar asteroids / comets for KSP2? Perhaps they could even have very weak gravity to allow 'walking' on the surface.

Thoughts?
yhea but what would you do at these astroids. i guess they could give you a lot of science points but since we dont know how the science sysstem will work idk about this
